授業目的:
＜Listening＞EC2 Listening aims to help students improve their listening and speaking. Students will listen to interviews, dialogues, and longer texts such as news stories. They will study vocabulary related to the topics as well as natural connected speech sounds.
＜Reading＞EC2 Reading is designed to develop students’ confidence, fluency, speed, and interest in reading in English.
＜Speaking＞ EC2 Speaking aims to enable students to have basic discussions on given topics. Students read articles about the topics and talk about the topics. They learn discussion questions, skills and language which help them to talk about the topics.
<Writing> EC2 Writing aims to teach students the basic language skills they require to succeed in EC3 and 4 Writing. These include important grammar points as well as a review of and further practice with basic paragraph structures.
到達目標:
<Listening> Students will be able to 1) develop better comprehension of spoken English; 2) develop and apply a basic knowledge of the organization of discursive tests 3) develop language competence.
<Reading> Students in EC3 Reading will be able to 1) increase their comprehension of a variety of texts 2) increase their vocabulary knowledge and 3) develop reading fluency, confidence and speed.
<Seminar> Students will be able to improve their academic discussion skills through reading articles and discussing them in class. Students learn vocabulary, discussion questions, and discussion skills.  <Writing> Students will be able to develop their understanding of the structure of paragraphs and how to write simple paragraphs with a clear topic sentence, two supporting ideas, details and a concluding sentence.

トピック.授業計画1:
<Listening> EC2 Listening covers 5 topics. In class, students listen to interviews and dialogues about each topic and study associated vocabulary and connected speech sounds. They practice using the learned language through conversations with classmates.
<Reading> In class, students will practice intensive reading skills and learn vocabulary by reading articles and completing response tasks for the graded readers.
<Speaking> EC2 Speaking prepares students to have basic discussions. The first part of the course introduces students to the idea of discussions while the second part introduces students to topic-related academic articles. Throughout the course, there are many opportunities for students to practice pair discussions.
<Writing> Students will 1) Practice writing on a given topic for a short period of time 2) Demonstrate the ability to use specific grammar and vocabulary and 3) Learn basic paragraph structure.
トピック.授業外学習2:
<Listening> Students will listen to dialogues, conversations and news stories for homework. They will also study vocabulary.
<Reading> Students will read graded readers, write graded reader response tasks, take online quizzes, and study vocabulary.
<Speaking> Students will read the articles, understand them, and memorise key sentences from them. They will complete homework related to the articles. They will also study topic-related vocabulary and grammar and use them in their graded homework preparation for the speaking tests. They should also try to have practice discussions outside class.
<Writing> Students will be engaged in writing tasks in-class and for homework. They will also complete three written assignments.
